alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 23 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Webb County through 1130 AM CDT... At 1059 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thompsonville, or 16 miles southwest of Hebbronville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mirando City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central Texas.
